definitions.definition: The pipes , together with the joints , tanks , stopcocks , taps , and other fixtures of a water , gas , or sewage system in a house or other building .
examples: Water was dripping from the ceiling, so we figured there was a problem with the plumbing .

definitions.definition: The trade or occupation of a plumber .
A system of vessels or ducts in the human body , especially the genitourinary system.
examples: My plumbing was playing up, so I had to see the doctor.

definitions.definition: Practical , concrete work serving to support other work.
examples: This is not scientific research as such: it's just plumbing .

definitions.definition: A Murasugi sum where each disk summed along has its boundary subdivided into four segments .

main_definition: The pipes , together with the joints , tanks , stopcocks , taps , and other fixtures of a water , gas , or sewage system in a house or other building .
secondary_definitions: The trade or occupation of a plumber .
( informal ) A system of vessels or ducts in the human body , especially the genitourinary system.
( informal , figurative ) Practical , concrete work serving to support other work.
( countable ) A Murasugi sum where each disk summed along has its boundary subdivided into four segments .
